Name: Flamestrike Surge
Story Background: In the heart of battle, when all seems lost, a surge of fiery energy can turn the tide.
Ability: Flamestrike Surge deals 3 damage to any target and you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Appearance Description: The card shows a mage summoning a torrent of flames from the sky, engulfing their enemies in a fiery inferno.
